page.title: 14Arkengarthdale School today
page.content: Arkengarthdale{School}is a{Church of {England Controlled School.}It stands half a mile from the village of Langthwaite.It contains 2 classrooms,a cloakroom,kitchen and toilets. In July 1985 there are 17 children on roll (12 boys and 5 girls). Staffing consists of the headteacher,a part-time teacher (15 hours a week), a lunch-time supervisor,a caretaker and a clerical/non-teaching assistant(6 hours per week). The{curriculum}includes Science, Environmental Studies, English, Religious Education, Physical Education, Music and Creative Activities. The children are taught to read by a variety of schemes and the Nuffield Mathematics Scheme is used.The{school day}runs from 08-45 hrs. to 12-00 hrs. and 13-15 hrs. to 15-15 hrs. in the afternoon.
